On the air with @MSNBC with @AlexWitt discussing, shutdown, new Congress, and more.

In this new Congress we must do what is right and not what is easy. So I'll say what needs to be said:

My colleague was flat-out wrong.

For more than 2 years, I hoped that a member of the president's party would rebuke his use of smutty language to launch unpresidential attacks.

It rarely happened.

Yesterday, one of my Democratic colleagues used some less-than-sanitary language when describing the president. As uncomfortable as it is, I must declare that wrong is wrong no matter the political label of the wrong-sayer.
